channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Australia news live: NSW police to decide whether to extend post-Bondi shooting protest ban; PM to visit flood-hit Queensland
item.description: Police commissioner Mal Lanyon’s current declaration restricts public assemblies in Sydney’s south-west, north-west and central metropolitan areas. Fo...

item.title: MPs across parties criticise ministers for stance on Trump attack on Venezuela
item.description: Starmer and Cooper challenged over cautious response to Maduro’s capture despite widespread doubts about legality MPs have attacked UK ministers over ...

item.title: Corporation For Public Broadcasting formally dissolves after federal funding cuts
item.description: Board of directors vote to dissolve organization after nearly 60 years in operation after funding cuts under Trump The nonprofit charged by Congress w...

item.title: ‘Soy inocente’: Maduro defiant in surreal New York courtroom spectacle
item.description: The Venezuelan leader entered a heartfelt not guilty plea – and told a member of the gallery he was a prisoner of war Venezuela crisis – latest update...

item.title: Nicolás Maduro pleads not guilty to US narco-terrorism charges and claims he is ‘still president’ of Venezuela – live
item.description: Lawyers for both Nicolás Maduro, and his wife, Cilia Flores, said that their clients won’t seek bail at this time; the next hearing will take place on...

item.title: Stop experiments and get manager who fits Man Utd DNA - Neville
item.description: Gary Neville urges Manchester United to 'stop experimenting' and appoint a manager who fits the club's DNA after Ruben Amorim was sacked on Monday.

item.title: Claire's and The Original Factory Shop to enter administration
item.description: The firms' owner said "alarming" low Christmas trading left both in a "vulnerable" position

item.title: O'Neill returns to Celtic for rest of season after Nancy sacked
item.description: Martin O'Neill is returning to Celtic as manager for the remainder of the season following the dismissal of Wilfried Nancy.

item.title: 'I'm a prisoner of war' - In the room for Maduro's dramatic court hearing
item.description: During the 40-minute arraignment, Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores, pleaded not guilty to drugs and weapon charges.

item.title: 'Nancy blunder evidence of Celtic's blurred vision'
